subcategory.name: Action Panels
subcategory.description: Action panel and well examples for Tailwind CSS, designed and built by the creators of the framework.
subcategory.introduction: Use these Tailwind CSS action panel components to blend user actions into your dashboards and settings pages. These components are designed and built by the Tailwind CSS team, and include a variety of different styles and layouts.
